ExternalData.Titlesect: Agreement for Facilitating the International Circulation of Visual and Auditory Materials of an Educational, Scientific and Cultural Character

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 12 August 1954, in accordance with article XII.

TreatyNote.Text: The Agreement was approved by the General Conference of the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization at its third session, held at Beirut from 17 November to 11 December 1948, in a resolution<superscript>1</superscript> adopted at the seventeenth plenary meeting on 10 December 1948.
